name: Plusho's Drumming Lessons
description:
This game is a joke made in 2 hours.
Take this as a sequel to tChamber.

CONTROLS

A - Kick
S - Snare
D - Mid Tom
F - High tom
---------------
H - Low tom
J - Hi Hat
K - Pedal Hat
L - Ride
---------------
Space - Crash (not the game, the drum)
---------------
Darako & Laulau @ 2019
